summary: THE TIE ROD'S BROKE WHILE DRIVING  15 MPH.   *JB   THE CONSUMER TURNED THE CORNER AND THE HANDLING HAD BECOME IMPOSSIBLE.  THE CONSUMER FOUND THAT BOTH FRONT WHEELS WERE POINTING INWARD AS THOUGH THE RIGHT FRONT WERE TURNING LEFT AND THE LEFT FRONT TURNING RIGHT.   *SCC.  ALSO THE RACK AND PINION WAS REPLACED AS WELL AS THE SERPENTINE BELT.  *JB
